name: MouseEvent.metaKey
description: The MouseEvent.metaKey read-only property is a Boolean that indicates whether the meta key was pressed or not when a given mouse event occurs.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'MouseEvent.metaKey' in the 'Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification' specification.
